verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> you are my God. <S%H430><s%> I will earnestly seek <S%H7836><s%> you. <S%H5315><s%> My soul thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for you. <S%H1320><s%> My flesh longs <S%H3642><s%> for you, <S%H6723><s%> in a dry and weary <S%H5889><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> where there is no <S%H1097><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>
So I have seen <S%H2372><s%> you in the sanctuary, <S%H3519><s%> watching <S%H7200><s%> your power <S%H5797><s%> and your glory. <S%H3519><s%>
Because your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than life, <S%H2416><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall praise you. <S%H7623><s%>
So I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you while I live. <S%H2416><s%> I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in your name. <S%H8034><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with the richest <S%H1880><s%> food. <S%H2459><s%> My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> you with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%>
when I remember <S%H2142><s%> you on my bed, <S%H3326><s%> and think <S%H1897><s%> about you in the night watches. <S%H821><s%>
For you have been my help. <S%H5833><s%> I will rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings. <S%H3671><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> stays close <S%H1692><s%> to <S%H310><s%> you. <S%H3225><s%> Your right hand holds me up. <S%H8551><s%>
But those who seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H7722><s%> it, <S%H935><s%> shall go into the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
They shall be given over <S%H5064><s%> to the power of the sword. <S%H3027><s%> They shall be jackal <S%H7776><s%> food. <S%H4521><s%>

But the king <S%H4428><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God. <S%H430><s%> Everyone who swears <S%H7650><s%> by him will praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H6310><s%> for the mouth of those who speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall be silenced. <S%H5534><s%>
